title: Energy Diagram Explorer
description: Interactive simulation for exploring potential energy curves, kinetic energy, turning points, equilibrium positions, and conservation of mechanical energy. Features four potential energy functions: Harmonic oscillator (spring), Gravity Valley (V-shaped), Double Well (bistable), and Gaussian Barrier.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: potential energy
kinetic energy
conservation of energy

turning points
equilibrium
classical mechanics
physics simulation
energy diagrams
educationalLevel: High School, AP Physics, Introductory College
